message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, $90 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $110. This is my best price, and I think it's a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $100? That's the highest I'm willing to go.
I understand you're close to your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go down to $100. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I can offer it to you for $105. This is as low as I can go.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $100 and $105, so I can offer you $102.50. That's the highest I'm willing to go.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to meet you at $102.50. I'm willing to make another concession, so I can offer it to you for $108. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value.
I understand you're trying to find a fair price, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $108. I'm willing to meet you at $105, but that's as high as I can go. Please consider it.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $105, Bob, but I'm still not sure if that's enough for me. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I can offer it to you for $110. This is my final price, and I think it's a great deal for both of us.

I understand this is your final price, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $110. I've already gone as high as I can, and I'm not willing to go any further. I think I'll have to pass on this deal and look elsewhere.
